Html:
Hello all, first time poster, long time user of Rawr.

I have a question. I have an item I wish to sub into an equipment slot so as to view how much it changes my build though when I click on the item and search for the replacement item it doesn't appear in the list. I then right click edit to find the item and even though it shows in that list I am unable to insert it into the build I want. The Item in question is "Enchanted Leather Sandals" (Item code 30886). I previously was able to do this in earlier builds but today it appears evasive.

Ideas please.

Thanks.
It would help if you tell us which model this applies to.
Apologies, was using the Druid Tree model.
